summary: Sally Lockhart and friends investigate the disappearance of a steamship, a magician who is threatened by thugs, a psychic with dark visions, and a heartless industrialist.
cast: Jared Harris|Doña Croll|David Harewood|JJ Feild|Billie Piper|Matt Smith|John Standing|Antonia Pemberton|Hayley Atwell|Owen Roe|Julian Rhind-Tutt|Richard Clews|Phil Cornwell|Peter Whittington|Jack Brady|Nicholas Blane|Jenifer Armitage|Georgia King|Roger Braban|Crispin Redman|Leelo Ross|Lyndsey Marshal|Lorenzo Camporese|Nick Mason|Paul Copley|Nitin Ganatra|Vyelle Croom|Adjoa Andoh|Nicholas Gasson|Alan Barnes|Paul Kennington
title: La sombra del norte
